projects.title: GoGig
projects.desc: A job search and recruiting platform.  I developed the open REST API for the platform, developed the web app, and developed the front end for their site.  Core Technologies: Javascript, Backbone, PHP, Slim

projects.title: MAD Greetings
projects.desc: An augmented realty greeting card app.  My role was developing the open REST API for the app.  Core Technologies: PHP, Slim

projects.title: Clue Video
projects.desc: A business and classifieds video directory.  I developed the Android and iOS apps.  Core Technologies: Javascript, Cordova/Phonegap, Backbone, PHP, Slim
